name: Urumqi
title: Urumqi - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Urumqi is the capital of Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region, located in the heart of Central Asia. Known for its diverse ethnic cultures, bustling bazaars, and proximity to stunning natural landscapes like Heavenly Lake, Urumqi serves as a gateway to exploring the ancient Silk Road and the vast region of Xinjiang.

highlights.attractions: Heavenly Lake (Tianchi), Xinjiang Regional Museum, Grand Bazaar, Red Hill Park
highlights.cuisine: Uyghur Polo, Lamb Kebabs, Naan Bread, Hand-pulled Noodles
highlights.bestTime: Summer (June-August) for pleasant weather and access to natural areas

gettingThere: By Air: Urumqi Diwopu International Airport (URC) with domestic and international flights
By Train: Major railway hub connecting to cities across China
By Bus: Long-distance bus services from neighboring regions
gettingAround: Metro: Modern subway system under development
Tour Bus: Organized tours to Heavenly Lake and other attractions
